post.body: it's the hive mind
time to pimp my snowmobile
slow down there sparky
goodbye MINI, hello Mazda 3
might trade in the MINI today
about an hour to vote at my precinct
standing in line to vote
ever felt like you've already put in a full week and it's only Thursday morning
wine after a long week, ahhhhh
what, it's Monday already?
stupid flu shot gave me the aches and pains
Listening to Fleet Foxes, catching up on blogs and making fresh tomato sauce
Some thoughts on the debate: http://snurl.com/41olk
holy cow, could palin be a bigger idiot
starting to get a handle around some corners of Commerce Server 2007
I have to say DynamicData is pretty freakin' cool
in new glarus wi
trying to figure out Commerce Server
at chicago jazz fest. just saw some blazin' bass players
drinking New Holland Sundog at the Edgewater
wonder who called NBC and told them to cut to Bush clapping when Iraq walked into the stadium
yeah this commute sucks big time
if this is December weather, maybe I will hibernate in January
we are finally getting to build stabilization with Emerson
